NK041(di)011:0: rten rnying gi arga spo chog ni rten rnying de'i mdun du mchod pa bshams /
NK041(di)011:1: bdag gi rnal 'byor rdzogs par bsgoms la /
NK041(di)011:2: dkon mchog la mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod la /
NK041(di)011:3: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don du bde bar gshegs pa'i rten rnying pa spo ba'am /
NK041(di)011:5: de gang sang nangs par bgyi bar 'tshal na de
NK041(di)011:6: bzhin rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes zhu
NK041(di)011:7: ba phul / chos skyong la gtor ma btang ste de bzhin gsol ba btab /
NK041(di)011:8: sang nangs par rten gyi drung du mchod pa bshams /
NK041(di)011:9: bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod pa bcas grub nas /
NK041(di)011:10: da ni rab gnas spo bar 'tshal na de bzhin du gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la /
NK041(di)011:11: me long dag par rten gyi gzugs brnyan 'char du bcug ste /
NK041(di)011:12: rten rnams me long gi nang du byon nas bzhugs par mos /
NK041(di)011:13: de las dam tshig pa bskyed /
NK041(di)011:14: ye shes pa bcug nas ji srid du me long nang der bzhugs par gsol ba btab /
NK041(di)011:15: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu yin pas cir yang mos pa bzhin 'char bar nges shes bskyed /
NK041(di)011:16: gzugs brnyan gyi lha rnams mchod bstod bsdus tsam byas la /
NK041(di)011:17: steng 'og mi nor ba'i mtshan ma byas te /
NK041(di)011:18: dar ser po sogs kyis g.yogs nas /
NK041(di)011:19: rgyab ngos su rgyas btab rten gsar pa grub nas
NK041(di)011:20: rab gnas byed pa'i dus la ma sleb bar du
NK041(di)011:21: kha mi dbye zhing gnas bde bar bzhag la mdun
NK041(di)011:23: rten rnying gi rdul rnams gsar ba'i nang du ji 'gro dang /
NK041(di)011:24: lhag ma rnams chu la spyan drangs ba'am /
NK041(di)011:25: tha mal bas longs ma spyad pa dang /
NK041(di)011:26: 'gom yug tu ma song bar mchod rten sogs kyi rgyur byas te rab gnas bya /
NK041(di)011:27: de ltar ma grub na ri mtho sa gtsang 'gom
NK041(di)011:28: yug med par lhag ma ma lus par spyan drangs
NK041(di)011:29: par bya'o // rten gsar pa'i rab gnas kyi sta
NK041(di)011:30: gon tshar nas dngos gzhi'i nub mo me long rten
NK041(di)011:31: gsar pa'i nang du spyan drangs /
NK041(di)011:32: ye shes pa gzhug pa'i mgor me long zhal kheb phye ste /
NK041(di)011:33: sngar gyi lha gang yin rnams yan lag bzhi rdzogs tshul gyis bzhugs pa de nyid /
NK041(di)011:35: slar yang nam mkha' khams kyi mthar thug pa nas ye shes pa gzhan yang drangs te bstims nas /
NK041(di)011:36: mchod pa sogs rab gnas kyi gzhung ltar bya'o //
NK041(di)011:37: zhes rje btsun grags pa'i gsung la gzhi byas /
